mapper.insert: insert into restaurant (rno, rono, name, code ,address1 ,address2, explanation, type, leastprice, call, cateno,file1,filesaved1,thumb,imagesize) values(restaurant_seq.nextval, 4, #{name}, #{code}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{explanation}, '치킨', #{leastprice}, #{call}, #{cateno}, #{file1},#{filesaved1}, #{thumb}, #{imagesize})
mapper.select: SELECT name, code, address1, rno, explanation, type, leastprice, call,file1,filesaved1,thumb,imagesize FROM restaurant

SELECT rno, rono, name, address1, address2, explanation, type, leastprice, deliverytip, call, score, reviewcount, recocnt, ordercnt, cateno,file1,filesaved1,thumb,imagesize FROM restaurant WHERE rno = #{rno}
SELECT rno, rono, name, address1, address2, explanation, type, leastprice, deliverytip, call, score, reviewcount, recocnt, ordercnt, cateno FROM restaurant WHERE rno = #{rno}
SELECT name, code, address1, rno, explanation, type, leastprice, call, cateno FROM restaurant WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurant SET recocnt = recocnt + 1 WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.insert: insert into recommendation (recono,rno, mno, rdate) values (recommendation_seq.nextval,#{rno },#{mno },sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(recono) from recommendation where mno=#{mno } and rno =#{rno }
